authentication.description: Log in an existing user and receive a JWT.

users.description: Get the profile (id and email) of the authenticated user. Requires JWT.

folders.description: Create a new folder for the authenticated user. Requires JWT.
Retrieve all folders for the authenticated user. Requires JWT.
Retrieve a specific folder by its ID for the authenticated user. Requires JWT.
Update a specific folder's name and/or description. Requires JWT.
Delete a specific folder. Requires JWT.

questionSets.description: Create a new question set within a folder. Requires JWT.
Retrieve all question sets within a specific folder. Requires JWT.
Retrieve a specific question set by its ID. Requires JWT.
Update a specific question set's name. Requires JWT.
Delete a specific question set. Requires JWT.

questions.description: Create a new question within a question set. Requires JWT.
Retrieve all questions within a specific question set. Requires JWT.
Retrieve a specific question by its ID. Requires JWT.
Update a specific question. Requires JWT.
Delete a specific question. Requires JWT.

ai.description: Generate questions from source text and create a question set. Requires JWT.
